doc.field: Maresi Company Confectioners and Caterers invoice
Maresi Company Confectioners and Caterers invoice

The collection contains one invoice from 1903 for catering an event at the Flushing Institute in Flushing, Long Island. The invoice includes a list of menu items served at the event. The Maresi Company Confectioners and Caterers had locations in Brooklyn (30 Clinton Street; 76 Seventh Avenue) and Manhattan (719 Sixth Avenue; 589 Madison Avenue; 320 Columbus Avenue).

The collection contains one invoice from 1903 for catering an event at the Flushing Institute in Flushing, Long Island. The invoice includes a list of menu items served at the event.
The Maresi Company Confectioners and Caterers had locations in Brooklyn (30 Clinton Street; 76 Seventh Avenue) and Manhattan (719 Sixth Avenue; 589 Madison Avenue; 320 Columbus Avenue).
Immediate source of acquisition is unknown. Collection was accessioned in 1985.
